item.title: On Virtual Currencies -- Not Just for Sex and Drugs (But Maybe for Rock 'n' Roll)
item.description: Virtual currencies are an intriguing concept. A very intriguing concept frankly. As humans, the (relatively) neutral mechanism which we use to transfer value between humans has almost exclusively been one of the main concepts which has remained solely within the purview of sovereigns. So, what happens when currencies are no longer the purview of sovereigns? Will it work? Will it implode without the sovereignty elephant backing a currency? I have no idea, but I'm fairly optimistic that it will work.
